experience.title: Software Developer
info: Used ETL to consume and manipulate data for analytics further down the data stream in order to make business decisions.

experience.title: Software Developer
info: Maintained an application used by agents to quote and issue insurance policies.

experience.title: Software Engineer
info: Created a dynamic, content-enabled website that displays company-wide sustainability information.
Used React to modernize AngularJS app. The app allows insurance customers to make payments for their policy by either making a one time payment or enrolling in automatic payments.

experience.title: Software Engineer
info: Uses a React to work on a traffic bucketing application for GoDaddy's experimentation platform.
This application helps teams at GoDaddy test new features by splitting incoming traffic to determine the effectiveness of potential new features.
